name: I Spy Baby Dragons (patrick-lauser)
description:
I Spy Baby Dragons

Explore this point-and-click game of I Spy, transmogrify things in the Pot of Transmogrification, defeat a Pestilent Creature, and find the Baby Dragons!

The main goal of the Adventure is to find the twenty two items from your Recipe of Triumph and transmogrify them together.

The second main goal is to achieve the Eye of Secrets, to find the secret passages, and the discovery to which their secrets lead.

Your pencil cursor will light up over portkeys to different areas of the adventure. Click on other objects to see if they are clues or items.

If you like here is a hint that will allow your pencil to light up over all clickable objects:

Show Hint Find the little doggy.

If you found the little dog, here's another hint if you need help with its clue:Another HintCypress.

There are about fifty seven places you can go; your progress is saved often, but only when you enter a place.

 Leave a comment about what you liked most, or if you find a glitch, or get stuck!

I hope you really find this Adventure intriguing! You can support the creator on Patreon!

God be with you!

Your Servant,
Patrick Lauser
